trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the security policy requires code to be type safe and the verification process is unable to verify that the code is type safe.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況，其為安全性原則要求程式碼必須是類型安全，且驗證流程無法驗證該程式碼為類型安全時所擲回。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.VerificationException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_VERIFICATION.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.VerificationException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_VERIFICATION。

trans-unit.source: A message indicating the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指示例外狀況發生原因的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class with an explanatory message.
trans-unit.target: 使用闡明的訊息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.VerificationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.VerificationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Security.VerificationException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
